_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The nine people who are worthy of offeri: The one practicing to realize the fruit of non-return
The one practicing to realize the fruit of once-return
The one practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry
A member of the spiritual family
